title: TrafficSituation announcement.
description: Structural representation of a traffic situation containing its key elements and all the language versions of announcements sent by Finnish Transportation Agency.

trafficAnnouncementType.title: The type of the traffic announcement
trafficAnnouncementType.description: The type of the traffic announcement. Omitted for other situation types. Note that ended and retracted are not actual types.

versionTime.descripion: Release time of this version of the announcement.

announcements.title: Announcements schema.
announcements.description: Contains announcement's different language versions available.

language.title: Language schema.
language.description: Language of the announcement. A subset of ISO 639-1.

roadWorkPhases.title: Road maintenance phases
roadWorkPhases.description: Contains the phases of this road work

earlyClosing.title: Road work was closed before the planned time.
earlyClosing.description: Road work was closed before the planned time. 'closed' means the road work closed after its start time, possibly skipping some phases. 'canceled' means the road work was canceled before its start time. Note: This field is omitted if the road work closes normally.

lastActiveItinerarySegment.title: Last active exempted transport itinerary segment
lastActiveItinerarySegment.description: The itinerary segment of this exempted transport that is or was last active.

startTime.title: Start time of the segment.
startTime.description: The time when the transport may start this segment.

endTime.title: end time of the segment.
endTime.description: Time by which the transport has finished this segment.

location.title: Location schema
location.description: Location of an traffic situation announcement

countryCode.title: Country code
countryCode.description: AlertC country code defined by RDS (IEC 62106)

locationTableNumber.title: Location table number
locationTableNumber.description: AlertC location table number. Country code + location table number fully identifies the table.

area-location.title: Area location
area-location.description: Location consisting of one or more areas.

locationCode.title: Location code of the area
locationCode.description: Number of the road point in AlertC location table

road-address-location.title: Road address location
road-address-location.description: Location consisting of a single road point or a road segment between two road points

directionDescription.title: DirectionDescription schema.
directionDescription.description: Human readable description of the affected direction

road-point.title: Road point schema
road-point.description: Description of a single road point

country.title: Country schema.
country.description: Usually Finland, but may be something else eq. Sweden, Norway, Russia.

roadAddress.title: RoadAddress schema.
roadAddress.description: Location in road address (road number + number of the road section + distance from the beginning of the road section.

distance.title: Distance schema.
distance.description: Distance from the beginning of the road section.

locationCode.title: AlertC location code
locationCode.description: Number of the location point in AlertC location table

distance.title: Distance from the road point
distance.description: Distance of the road point from the AlertC location point

feature.title: Feature schema.
feature.description: Feature describes characteristics and qualities of the situation.

name.title: Feature name
name.description: Feature name, e.g. black ice on road, or speed limit

quantity.title: Feature quantity
quantity.description: Feature quantity, e.g. 30 in {speed limit, 30, km/h}

unit.title: Unit of the feature quantity
unit.description: Unit of the feature quantity, e.g. km/h in {speed limit, 30, km/h}

description.title: Description of the feature
description.description: Further details of the feature, e.g. description of a detour

road-work-phase.title: Road work phase
road-work-phase.description: A single phase in a larger road work

worktypes.title: The types of work that are carried out

type.title: Type of the restriction
enum: narrow or closed pedestrian and bicyle path

restrictionsLiftable.title: Restrictions can be lifted for abnormal transports

severity.title: Severity of the disruption to traffic
severity.description: How severely this road work phase disrupts traffic. low - no disruption, high - disruption, highest - significant disruption

workingHours.description: The working hours of the road work.

endTime.title: EndTime schema.
endTime.description: End time of the situation. If the end time has been passed, the situation can be assumed to be over. If end time is not given, there will be follow-up announcement about the situation.

estimatedDuration.title: EstimatedDuration schema.
estimatedDuration.description: If exact endtime is not known, duration may be estimated

startArea.title: Description of the leg start
startArea.description: Description of the place on the road, where this leg starts.

endArea.title: Description of the leg end
endArea.description: Description of the place on the road, where this leg ends.

startTime.title: StartTime
startTime.description: Start time of the time period using ISO 8601 local time

endTime.title: EndTime
endTime.description: End time of the time period using ISO 8601 local time
